snippet.title: Fighting Games are BORING, So I made one that makes you feel like a god
snippet.description:
Install Raid for Free ✅ IOS/ANDROID/PC: https://clcr.me/zWdo4b and get a special starter pack 💥 Available only for the next 30 days

I've been playing a lot of chess recently, & have been wishing that chess wasn't so boring, & so I try to make a fighting game that is strategic like chess, but is fun to watch! So I made a turn based fighting game inspired by Toribash, my take on a martial arts simulation game!

Play Ultrabouters: https://jabrils.itch.io/ultrabouters
Follow Me On Itch io: https://itch.io/profile/jabrils

SUBSCRIBE FOR MORE: http://jabrils.com/yt
WISHLIST MY VIDEO GAME: https://store.steampowered.com/app/881710/Staggered/
SUPPORT ON PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/Jabrils
JOIN DISCORD: https://discord.gg/qgaahvc

Please follow me on social networks:
twitter: https://twitter.com/jabrils_
instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jabrils_/

REMEMBER TO ALWAYS FEED YOUR CURIOSITY
